name: Catacomb Demo (WIP)
description:
Catacomb is a prototype first person shooter with guns, physics, portals, and heavy metal. Placeholder enemies are coming out of portals for some reason so you better grab some ammo and shoot them for reasons that are still unclear. For every enemy you kill, two will take their place.

This game is a work in progress, and it is made with Unity. It's come a long way from grey blocked levels and buggy ai, but it still has a long way to go!

How To Play Key / Button Function W Walk forwards. A Strafe to the right. S Strafe to the left. D Walk backwards. E Pickup object. Left Click Fire weapon. Scroll Change weapon. Middle Mouse Button (Hold) Pickup object. Rick Click (Hold) Charge throw (whilst holding an object).
Future Improvements
  • Better enemy art.
  • Better environment art.
  • Bigger more open maps.
  • More realistic blood spatter.
  • Multiple spawn locations for enemies.
  • Leader board.

Soundtrack by Fred Bux (you should hire him)
